credit_line: Gift of Richard C. Greenleaf Esq. in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
title: Border
description: Long border or collar, straight on one edge and scalloped on the other, shaped with a wide central section that narrows out on the ends. Point d'Argentan style in a rich design with a great variety of stitches. A conventionalized vase form alternates with rich floral motifs. Hexagonal ground.
name: Border
